description:
Listed Building Consent application in connection with external repairs and refurbishment of existing roofs, repair/renew existing guttering and rainwater downpipes. Repoint defective brickwork and repair cracks, repair/renew/repaint defective render. Clean external masonry, repair stone cills, renew spalling brickwork. Existing metal railings to be repaired/redecorated. Overhaul/renew/repaint windows and external doors as scheduled on the accompanying drawings and justification statement.  Replacement of window to front elevation.  PLEASE NOTE: Corrected address details 
This application may affect the character and appearance of a conservation area and the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Sections 67 and 73.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
